Reviews.Title: “Not the ritz but great location”
Reviews.Author: AndreaBoyd
Reviews.Content: traveled school october trip rome school book school contacts expecting hotel hostel youths situation arrived max hotel annoyed lift smelly hike 27 stairs suitcases reception reception grated friendly handsome italian hotel breakfast spotless cleaned daily bed sheets cleaned daily breakfast provided morning terrible local shop door hotel bakery purchases buns chocolate breakfast stayed hotel dinner provided location hotel fantastic 20min walk famous fountain 5 minutes train station lots designer shops rome explore city day hotel max resting nest rome

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: BobbyatWells
Reviews.Content: worried hotel read previous reviews tripadvisor pleasantly surprised hotel max admittedly common shared hotels lift smell provided clean size bedded suitable adults bathrooms clean towels provided day breakfasts wholesome little boring little variety staff friendly extremely helpful taking rome recommend hotel max

Reviews.Title: “Not terrible.”
Reviews.Author: 1Minerva
Reviews.Content: bad lot reviews sizes shower lot traffic noise expected close termini location easy walk colosseum trevi fountain etc breakfast roll jam supermarkets street reccomend frills budget hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location and condition for the price”
Reviews.Author: Mihaela_Manea
Reviews.Content: visit rome middle february 4 people stayed 3 night max hotel hotel 3rd floor building hotels stairs elevator 100 clean didnt bother location perfect near termini station easy hotel perfectly clean toilet tv fridge personal safe leave valuables towels changed day stuff nice day arrived hotel 1100 am checkin 100 pm day plane 1000 pm live luggage day bag coffee hotel bad ps hotel hard send 10 minutes internet trip search location

Reviews.Title: “The worst experience in my life”
Reviews.Author: gantzer89
Reviews.Content: impossible stairs elevator dirty halls hotel smelled bad staff bathroom near booked persons beds close adapted strongly discourage dont book

Reviews.Title: “Great location! Hotel could be better, but it was okay...”
Reviews.Author: PsychoFairy
Reviews.Content: planned stay hotel didnt 41 persons hours left rome heard hotel changed hotel max anyway left try didnt didnt chance google hotel anymore leaving arrived noticed 6 hotels building climb 3rd floor reception max situated pass day disgusting dusty cigarettes floor didnt trust elevator organisation mess werent prepared chaos finally chance couldnt ignore terrible smell coming door immediately window hotel evening smell gone reason cleaning lady closed window single day hotel smelly tiny wasnt space 3 people luggage breakfast poor 1 piece bread choose nutella honey jam day tried drink cappuccino tasted water dishes hot chocolate tried day okay hungry despar supermarket buy positive location central station termini 2 minutes easily train underground bathrooms size compare size bedroom fresh towels day pleasant staff okay discussions time eachother anyway stay okay wasnt hotel ive stayed study dont lot luxury bad
